steps.name: Given I upload the Loader files from marked_file_path into yw-loader-2 AWS S3 bucket
Then I delete the data from loader_file_location collection
Then I write the data into loader_file_location collection
Given I am on login screen
When I enter the valid Login credential
And I hit login button
And I verify dashboard is displayed
Then I click on "Loader Policies" from menu
And I verify the create policy button is displayed
And I click on the create policy button
And I enter policy name LoaderPolicy
And I enter policy version LoaderPolicy
And I enter policy description LoaderPolicy
And I enter policy owner email automation@yieldwerx.com
And I click on Add stage button
And I select "Load" stage
# And I click on View button
And I select source as "Cloud Storage"
And I enter source container LoaderPolicy
And I check the "Read PTR" option in die
And I check the "Read FTR" option in die
And I check the "Read MPR" option in die
And I check all summary records
And I select schedule mode as "Poller"
And I select schedule mode as
And I enter policy polling time LoaderPolicy
And I click on Save button
Then I connect to YW database
And I click on "Control Tower" from menu
And I verify the FINISHED status from step intake queue
And I verify the load is successfully executed
Then I verify policy data is created in yield-werx-db
Then I verify the SUCCESS status of policy in database from loader_file_location
